messages.message: I don't know if I would say ground truth and deployment runs are rare. I don't agree that keeping it as `/apps/runs` is fine, I don't think it makes sense to keep a misleading api name just because it's more convenient
I still don't see the issue if we have both `/apps/runs` and `/runs` pointing to the same `ResultsView` class. Minimal fragmentation in the codebase & backwards compatibility is maintained

I like the idea of having better naming on our URLs! But probably not in our v1/v2 endpoints right now.

Even if we're making a backwards compatible change, it'll result in more questions than answers from customers; which goes against the whole intention for this change (less confusion for customers/ourselves).

This is something we can do when we start designing our v3 endpoints.
Got it, so what are my options for adding endpoints to modify run results in task based review? Should I design them in v3 folder?
We don't have v3 endpoints yet so I'd hold off on that. I see your new endpoints in the doc and I'll defer to @Anil and @Abhishek Adupa for URL naming suggestions -- they're good at naming things.
